description:
With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s an Emergency! The Ryugu Palace Is Occupied!
Kinkyuu Jitai Hassei: Senkyo Sareta Ryuuguujou
¡Estado de emergencia! ¡El palacio Ryuugu ha sido asaltado!
État d`urgence. Le palais Ryûgû est envahi.
緊急事態発生 占拠された竜宮城
